title: Beyond the Ridge
description: Beyond the Ridge shows “Goble at his best” ( SLJ ) in this beautiful, comforting, and simple book to help children of all ages process and grieve the loss of a loved one.Paul Goble’s stunning picture book brings a piece of Plains Indian tradition to life in a way that is certain to comfort children who have experienced loss and the heartbreak it brings.Following the spirt journey of an elder woman after she’s passed, Beyond the Ridge will help young readers understand the journey of life through the eyes of a daughter who hears the call of her mother.
author: Paul Goble
